name: io.github.lu-zhengda/virtual-fs
description: PostgreSQL-backed virtual filesystem for AI agents with persistent, session-isolated storage.

environmentVariables.name: VFS_AUTO_INIT
environmentVariables.description: Auto-create database tables on startup (set to 'true' for first run)

environmentVariables.name: VFS_SESSION_ID
environmentVariables.description: Deterministic session ID for resumable sessions across restarts

environmentVariables.name: VFS_ENABLE_RLS
environmentVariables.description: Enable PostgreSQL Row Level Security for database-enforced session isolation
